perturbation.original_text:
For purposes of this Agreement, the terms listed below have the following meanings: Other terms used in this Agreement are defined and construed in the context in which they occur.

         "Affiliate"  - Any person or legal entity that  directly or  indirectly owns or  controls  Pretzel  Time,  that  is  directly  or  indirectly  owned  or controlled by Pretzel  Time, or that is under common  control with Pretzel Time. For purposes of this  definition,  "control"  means the power to direct or cause the direction of the management and policies of an entity.
perturbation.changed_text:
For purposes of this Agreement, the terms listed below have the following meanings: Other terms used in this Agreement are defined and construed in the context in which they occur.

         "Subsidiary"  - Any person or legal entity that  directly or  indirectly owns or  controls  Pretzel  Time,  that  is  directly  or  indirectly  owned  or controlled by Pretzel  Time, or that is under common  control with Pretzel Time. For purposes of this  definition,  "control"  means the power to direct or cause the direction of the management and policies of an entity.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Affiliate' is replaced with 'Subsidiary' without defining if both terms are interchangeable or not. This creates ambiguity, particularly regarding obligations involving related entities.

perturbation.original_text:
Pretzel  Time hereby  grants to  Franchisee  and  Franchisee  agrees to undertake,  during the term of this  Agreement and upon the terms and conditions stated in this Agreement, the right, license and privilege to operate,  conduct,



and do business  and to use certain  trade  names,  trademarks,  service  marks, logos,  and other  commercial  symbols,  including  Pretzel Time (referred to as "Marks") solely and  exclusively for the operation of one retail  franchise Unit (referred to as "Franchise"), which is in the form of a (Store/Kiosk/Cart),  and to sell  those  Products  known as  Pretzel  Time  pretzels  and  other  Pretzel Time-approved   menu  items  and  Products   further   described  in  Section  2 (hereinafter "Products") in accordance with the provisions of this Agreement and in accordance with rules,  standards,  systems,  and procedures as prescribed by Pretzel Time which may be changed,  improved and further  developed from time to time,  (hereinafter  "Pretzel  Time  System"),  at one (1) location  only,  such location to be
perturbation.changed_text:
Pretzel  Time hereby  grants to  Franchisee  and  Franchisee  agrees to undertake,  during the term of this  Agreement and upon the terms and conditions stated in this Agreement, the right, license and privilege to operate,  conduct,



and do business  and to use certain  trade  names,  trademarks,  service  marks, logos,  and other  commercial  symbols,  including  Pretzel Time (referred to as "Marks") solely and  exclusively for the operation of one retail  franchise Unit (referred to as "Outlet"), which is in the form of a (Store/Kiosk/Cart),  and to sell  those  Products  known as  Pretzel  Time  pretzels  and  other  Pretzel Time-approved   menu  items  and  Products   further   described  in  Section  2 (hereinafter "Products") in accordance with the provisions of this Agreement and in accordance with rules,  standards,  systems,  and procedures as prescribed by Pretzel Time which may be changed,  improved and further  developed from time to time,  (hereinafter  "Pretzel  Time  System"),  at one (1) location  only,  such location to be
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Franchise' is replaced with 'Outlet' without clearly stating if both are synonymous. This can lead to confusion, particularly if the agreement later refers to 'Franchise' in contexts where it's unclear if it includes 'Outlet.'

perturbation.original_text: Franchisee  acknowledges  and agrees that  Pretzel  Time has expended a considerable  amount of time and effort in  developing  and refining the recipes for, the methods of preparation of, the Products.  Pretzel Time may from time to time modify such recipes and methods of preparation, which may include requiring Franchisee  to prepare  pretzels and other  Products  from scratch  mixes and to purchase  prepared food  products from Pretzel Time or an approved  Pretzel Time Affiliate.
perturbation.changed_text: Franchisee  acknowledges  and agrees that  Pretzel  Time has expended a considerable  amount of time and effort in  developing  and refining the recipes for, the methods of preparation of, the Items.  Pretzel Time may from time to time modify such recipes and methods of preparation, which may include requiring Franchisee  to prepare  pretzels and other  Items  from scratch  mixes and to purchase  prepared food  products from Pretzel Time or an approved  Pretzel Time Affiliate.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Products' to 'Items' introduces ambiguity. While 'Products' is later defined, 'Items' is not, potentially leading to disputes about what falls under its scope and affecting supply obligations.
